attributes.action: make the staff at Number10.gov.uk respond to emails sent to them by petition organisers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Number10.gov.uk have failed to respond to my last three emails desperately requesting access to send an email to the 500+ people that have sign my petition. 

Without being able to do this, my campaign will fail and my town will have a seriously poor train service.

Please, please, please respond to me and allow me to send an email to the individuals that have signed up to my petition (keepourtrains)

rejection.details:
Dr Nash, 
Please contact us at webmaster@pmo.gov.uk. Unfortunately we will not be able to release email addresses to you in accordance with our terms and conditions. However, if you would like us to close your petition earlier than November, which will then prompt a response from the e-petitions team to signatories on the list, please let us know. 
Regards, 
Petitions team.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
